Name: Magic Research
About the game: In Magic Research , you are the headmaster of a newly-created institution of Magic with one goal: to learn as much as possible about this power and get enough fame to be able to compete, and win, the prestigious competition of schools: the Tournament of Magic. But what will you discover along the way? Cast over a hundred different spells with various effects Research magic in various magical schools to discover new, surprising ways to use this power Accumulate resources and build the school campus Manage a team of researchers and apprentices to lead your school to fame Discover tons of hidden new features - when will you unlock the next one? Find over six dozen secret Storylines with permanent, game-altering effects Restart the game and make faster progress each time with retirement bonuses Over 40 hours of addictive gameplay!
